oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Sam Houston portrait
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Portrait of Sam Houston (1793-1863) as U.S. Senator, at the beginning of his long fight against disunion. Houston is wearing a full beard. Image 11 of 16 in folder. From The Raven: A Biography of Sam Houston.
The only known authentic likeness of Houston wearing a full beard, which was one of his eccentricities during periods of depression.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Houston, Sam, 1793-1863
Houston, Sam, 1793-1863;Tennessee. Governor;Legislators--United States
